byline.contributor: Abby Goodnough, Emma Cott and John Woo contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: In June 2015, the Times profiled David Elson, a chronically ill Kentucky man who signed up for insurance through the Affordable Care Act but lost it after not paying the premiums.

headline.main: A Hard Road to Health Insurance

snippet: In June 2015, the Times profiled David Elson, a chronically ill Kentucky man who signed up for insurance through the Affordable Care Act but lost it after not paying the premiums.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
